Name: In Verbis Virtus
About the game: Use your real voice to cast spells in In Verbis Virtus , a fantasy adventure unlike any other. Step into the shoes of a wizard in search of an ancient power. Explore a lost temple, making your way through forgotten chambers brimming with unspeakable beauty and terror. Unlock spells and use them to solve the temple’s enigmas and battle the monsters that lurk in its depths. Built on the Unreal Engine, lose yourself in the breathtaking world of In Verbis Virtus , possibly the most unique and immersive game you’ll play all year. Key Features Cast spells in Maha’ki, the language of the gods, using your own voice. Discover and learn multiple spells, each with its own purpose and power. Solve challenging puzzles, escape traps and battle monsters with magic. Explore a lost temple, uncovering the secrets of its mysterious past, as well as your own. Experience stunning graphics powered by the Unreal Engine.
